__e: Aidan didn't come home last night and his mom's worried.
Don't pretend like you don't know what I'm talking about!
I can't believe Aidan didn't mention he had a sister.
My family hasn't always been there for me, which is why I started a new family with Aidan and Josh.
It's not so much what happened with Aidan, it's how he treated me after it happened.
OK, look me in the eye, please, Aidan, and tell me the last few weeks haven't meant anything to you.
